# Body

**Associated Type**

The type of effect representing the body of this effect. When you create a custom effect, Swift infers this type from your implementation of the required [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/CustomHoverEffect/body(content:)] method.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Body : CustomHoverEffect
```
